• Creatinine and CD4 count should still be done to determine her renal function and the need for prophylaxis for
pneumocystis jerovecii pneumonia (PJP) and cryptococcal meningitis (CM).
• TDF, 3TC, and DTG (as the fixed- dose combination TLD) is the preferred regimen for women who are newly
initiating, or re -initiating, ART. ART should be initiated on the same day as HIV diagnosis, and after contra- 
indications to ART have been excluded
• Pregnant w omen who are already on TLD at entry
